short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run Flash content from the web with Newgrounds.io integration on your desktop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to play Newgrounds games on your desktop? Now you can!

Flash Forwarder Tools is a powerful extension that detects and retrieves .swf files from Newgrounds and other websites, letting you enjoy your favorite Flash games seamlessly on your computer. With the help of a dedicated desktop Flash Player, you can relive the classic Newgrounds experience anytime.

What’s more? Newgrounds.io features are fully supported! Unlock medals, post scores, and engage with the community just like you would on the website. Plus, the extension isn’t limited to Newgrounds—you can load .swf files from other websites too.

Note: This extension requires the Flash Forwarder Tools standalone application installed on your computer.
